Class Conflict

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.politics.military.Conflict
All Implemented Interfaces:
Locatable, Identifiable<String>, Temporal
public class Conflict extends Object implements Identifiable<String>, Locatable, Temporal
Represents a military conflict, war, or battle.

1.0
